# Arthur Diniz da Luz - Portfolio

> Personal portfolio website of Arthur Diniz da Luz, a Full-Stack Software Developer and Co-Founder of iOHub Digital. Specializing in AI-powered solutions, React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.

## About

Arthur Diniz da Luz is a Full-Stack Software Developer with a Bachelor's in Computer Science and over four years of experience building effective, scalable software solutions. He is the Co-Founder of iOHub Digital, a tech company specializing in SaaS products for the Brazilian market.

**Key Expertise:**

- Full-Stack Development (React.js, Next.js, Node.js, NestJS)
- AI Implementation (RAG Architecture, ChromaDB, Google Gemini)
- Cloud & DevOps (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD)
- Database Management (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis)
- Mobile Development (React Native)

## Core Content

### Professional Overview

- [Home](https://arthurdiluz.github.io/): Main portfolio landing page showcasing Arthur's professional background, skills, and featured projects
- [About Section](https://arthurdiluz.github.io/#about): Detailed information about Arthur's background, education, and professional journey
- [Technical Skills](https://arthurdiluz.github.io/#skills): Comprehensive list of programming languages, frameworks, and technologies
- [Resume/CV](https://arthurdiluz.github.io/assets/pdf/resume_arthur-diniz-da-luz.pdf): Professional resume in PDF format

### Projects & Portfolio

- [Portfolio Section](https://arthurdiluz.github.io/#portfolio): Showcase of key projects and development work
- [Bonchef](https://app.bonchef.com.br/lp2?utm_source=diniz_portfolio): AI-powered SaaS platform for restaurant management with real-time synchronization
- [TourLibras](https://github.com/arthurdiluz/tourlibras-api): Application teaching Brazilian Sign Language through interactive lessons
- [BeTheHero](https://github.com/arthurdiluz/be-the-hero): NGO support platform connecting donors with charitable causes
- [2048 Game](https://github.com/arthurdiluz/the-2048): Desktop implementation of the popular 2048 puzzle game

### Professional Experience

- [Experience Timeline](https://arthurdiluz.github.io/#experience): Career progression from intern to co-founder
- [iOHub Digital](https://www.iohub.digital): Technology consulting company co-founded by Arthur
- [LinkedIn Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arthurdiluz/): Professional network and career details
- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/arthurdiluz): Open source contributions and code repositories

## Services & Expertise

### Development Services

- Programming Languages: JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, Python, Golang
- Backend Development: Node.js, NestJS, Express.js, Fastify, Buffalo
- Frontend & Mobile: React.js, Next.js, React Native
- AI & Data: ChromaDB, RAG Architecture, Embeddings
- Database & Cache: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Firebase, Supabase
- Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, ECS), Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD

### Key Technologies

- **Frontend**: React.js, Next.js, React Native, TypeScript
- **Backend**: Node.js, NestJS, Express.js, Python, Golang
- **AI/ML**: RAG Architecture, ChromaDB, Google Gemini, Embeddings
- **Database**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Firebase, Supabase
- **Cloud**: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, ECS), GCP, Docker, Kubernetes
- **DevOps**: GitHub Actions, AWS CodePipeline, CI/CD

## Professional Background

### Education

- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science (Universidade Estadual do Norte do Paran√° - UENP, 2017-2023)
- English Proficiency Certification (Wizard Language School, 2010-2016)

### Career Highlights

- **Co-Founder & Software Engineer at iOHub Digital** (2023-Present): Leading development of AI-powered SaaS solutions
- **Software Engineer at Superior Digital** (2023-2024): Full-stack development of property management and e-commerce platforms
- **Software Engineer at Kodde** (2022-2023): Backend development and system architecture
- **Intern at Tata Consultancy Services** (2021-2022): Technical consulting and software development training

### Key Projects

- **Bonchef**: AI-powered restaurant management SaaS with conversational AI, real-time synchronization, and POS integration
- **CertifyMyRent**: Multi-tenant property management platform with Stripe integration
- **Construction Help Finder**: Mobile app connecting construction workers with project managers
- **Madalu**: Beauty service scheduling system with NestJS backend

## Technical Specializations

### AI & Machine Learning

- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures
- Vector databases (ChromaDB)
- Semantic search and embeddings
- Conversational AI agents
- Google Gemini integration

### Full-Stack Development

- Modern JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystems
- React ecosystem (React.js, Next.js, React Native)
- Node.js frameworks (NestJS, Express.js, Fastify)
- RESTful API design and GraphQL
- Real-time applications with WebSockets

### Cloud & Infrastructure

- AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, ECS)
- Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
- CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, AWS CodePipeline)
- Infrastructure as Code
- Scalable architecture design

This portfolio represents Arthur's expertise in modern software development, with a focus on AI-powered solutions, full-stack web development, and scalable SaaS platforms. The site showcases both individual technical skills and entrepreneurial experience through iOHub Digital.
